book.synopsis: Witnessing the injustices against Native Americans by European settlers from childhood, Diego de la Vega, the son of an aristocratic Spanish landowner and a Shoshone mother, returns to California from school in Spain to reclaim the hacienda on which he was raised to seek justice for the weak and helpless. (Historical Fiction)
book.dimensions: Height: 8.75 Inches, Length: 5.75 Inches, Weight: 1.95 Pounds, Width: 1.25 Inches
